attributes.action: Stop the discrimination against Eastern Europeans in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Eastern Europeans are suffering discrimination in the workplace where they have been considered to be cheap and economically disposable workers.
attributes.background:
Eastern Europeans are regarded as second class citizens in the UK, subjected to discrimination and hate.
They are constantly subject to negativism in the tabloid media.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to support Eastern European people in the UK.
